dict.string: ⚠️If you don't see the "Preferred language" option here
Please go to 📱 [Settings] -> [General] -> [Language & Region] and add the language you wish to set as the second language.
简体中文, 日本語, English, 繁體中文, 繁體中文（香港）, Français, Русский, Tiếng Việt
​⚠️If you don't see the "Preferred language" option here
​Please go to 📱 [Settings] -> [General] -> [Language & Region] and add the language you wish to set as the second language.
​简体中文, 日本語, English, 繁體中文, 繁體中文（香港）, Français, Русский, Tiếng Việt
